domTranslations.#no-instances-subtitle: Ready to give me some action? Open up a chess game site and let me finally have some fun! I've been waiting patiently, counting my virtual fingers, just dying to make some moves!
domTranslations..stable-sites .sites-subtitle: (Works fine, but might have some minor bugs)
domTranslations..unstable-sites .sites-subtitle: (Might work fine, be buggy or not work at all)
domTranslations.#chess-engine-profile-dropdown .input-su: Multiple profiles can be active at the same time!
domTranslations..tos-description:
We're thrilled to have you here! A.C.A.S is all set and ready to provide you with a fantastic experience. Its circuits are already powered up and functioning, thanks to the userscript that has been installed.

You're fully equipped to explore and enjoy all the features and benefits that A.C.A.S brings to the table. Whether it's assistance, engagement, or a touch of fun you're seeking, A.C.A.S is here to serve you.
domTranslations..tos-link: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service.
domTranslations..tos-footer-small: By using A.C.A.S, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by the TOS.
domTranslations.#thanks-for-using-footer-text: Thanks for using A.C.A.S, a handcrafted project made by a solo developer.
domTranslations..no-updates-disclaimer-text: Do not ask for updates for these
domTranslations.#install-mobile-container .install-subti: Mobile users can try these â™¡ â¤µ
domTranslations.*[data-translation-special-deals]: Thanks for using A.C.A.S, you're eligble for new special deals!
domTranslations.*[data-translation-teamed-up]: We've teamed up with AliExpress to offer A.C.A.S. users great deals! Any purchases after visiting the link aid A.C.A.S' development.
domTranslations.*[data-translation-support-disclaimer]: Your purchases help support the development of A.C.A.S at no extra cost to you. Without this A.C.A.S would receive less updates.
domTranslations.*[data-translation-we-are-partnered-ali]: We've partnered with AliExpress to bring A.C.A.S users great deals. We do our best to recommend quality products, no junk.
domTranslations.*[data-translation-if-you-find-something: If you find something you like, awesome! But even if you choose something else, using our link still helps support us. We really appreciate it!
domTranslations.*[data-translation-support-page-disclaim: These are referral links, meaning we earn a commission when you buy through them. It won't cost you extra, but it helps support the project.
domTranslations.*[data-translation-wiki-1]: Always keep the A.C.A.S GUI visible on a separate window to prevent freezing. If issues persist, restart your PC, use Violentmonkey, and try a Chromium-based browser like Brave with the default config.

useChess960: Make engine use Chess960 chess variant
moveSuggestionAmount: How many arrows will show up
arrowOpacity: Change the opacity of the arrows
autoMove: For Chess.com. Use only against bots
autoMoveAfterUser: Start the Auto Move after user move
autoMoveLegit: Attempt to make Auto Move more legit
autoMoveRandom: Play other moves than the best one
displayMovesOnExternalSite: Show move arrows on chess site's board (e.g. chess.com's board)
engineNodes: More nodes means more thinking of the move by the engine
legitModeType: What kind of player should Auto Move play
moveDisplayDelay: Show the move arrows after this time
onlyCalculateOwnTurn: Only get move suggestions on your own turn
onlyShowTopMoves: Only show the best move the engine found
showOpponentMoveGuess: Show the engine's guess of what move the enemy makes after you play the suggested move
advancedElo: Engine tries to play at this level
advancedEloDepth: How deep will the engine calculate
advancedEloSkill: Sets the skill level of the engine
advancedEloThreads: Sets how many threads a multithreaded engine will use
renderOnExternalSite: Render on chess site's board (e.g. chess.com's board)
renderSquarePlayer: Highlight squares your pieces see with green
renderSquareEnemy: Highlight squares enemy's pieces see with red
renderPiecePlayerCapture: Display ðŸ’§ on pieces that are in danger of capture
renderPieceEnemyCapture: Display ðŸ©¸ on pieces that you should attack

translations.profileRemovalWarning:
Are you sure you want to remove this profile?

This action cannot be reversed.
translations.settingsResetWarning:
Are you sure you want to reset settings?

DANGER: This action is irreversable and will reset your whole config!
translations.refreshSiteNotification: Refresh the external site to see changes!
translations.configImportSuccess: Successfully imported settings from a config file!
translations.configInvalidError: Invalid config file, missing "global" or "instance" keys!
translations.configInvalidFiletype: Wrong file type loaded, the config needs to be a .json file!
translations.engineNoLimitations: Engine has no strength limitations, running infinite depth!
translations.maiaNodeWarning: Maia weights work best with no search, please only use one (1) search node!
translations.failedToEnableBuffer: FATAL ERROR: COI failed to enable SharedArrayBuffer, report issue to GitHub!
translations.ownTurnMightNotWorkVariants: 'Only Own Turn' setting might not work for variants!
translations.emptyBoardChesscomWarning:
Oh, the board seems to be empty. This is most likely caused by the site displaying the board as an image which A.C.A.S cannot parse.

Please disable 'Piece Animations: Arcade' on Chess.com settings! (Set to 'None')
translations.excessiveTabChangeWarning:
Warning: Excessive tab switching detected. Continued switching may result in a ban.

To avoid needing to switch between tabs, do one of the following,
- Make two separate windows side by side
- Display moves on the page (This is easily detectable)
- Enable TTS (Text to Speech)
translations.instanceConnectionTermination:
Terminated instance due to lost connection.

Unexpected? Visit the tab to reactivate A.C.A.S.
